mapper.select: SELECT priv.* from SysPrivilege priv join SysRolePrivilegeRelation r_role_priv ON r_role_priv.privilegeId=priv.id join SysRoleUserRelation r_role_user ON r_role_user.roleId=r_role_priv.roleId where r_role_user.userId = #{userId} AND priv.deleted != true and priv.disabled!= true order by priv.id asc
